languages.text: "Ложь! Для меня нет наслаждения в том, чтобы нисходить до презренных мерзостей, творимых еретиками! Я ненавижу их!"
"Lies! I take no pleasure in stooping to the despicable and revolting things that heretics do! I detest them!"
languages.original_text: "Ложь! Для меня нет наслаждения в том, чтобы нисходить до презренных мерзостей, творимых еретиками! Я ненавижу их!"

traits.locale_text: "Lies! I take no pleasure in stooping to the despicable and revolting things that heretics do! I detest them!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Lies! I take no pleasure in stooping to the despicable and revolting things that heretics do! I detest them!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “你撒谎！这些卑鄙龌龊的事情，只有异端分子才会喜欢！审判与处刑没有给我带来任何快乐！我憎恨这些事情！”
languages.original_text: "Lies! I take no pleasure in stooping to the despicable and revolting things that heretics do! I detest them!"

traits.locale_text: “你撒谎！这些卑鄙龌龊的事情，只有异端分子才会喜欢！审判与处刑没有给我带来任何快乐！我憎恨这些事情！”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「嘘だ！私は自ら望んで卑劣な行為を行ったり、異端者と同じように反逆行為を起こしたりはしない！異端者は嫌いだ！」
languages.original_text: "Lies! I take no pleasure in stooping to the despicable and revolting things that heretics do! I detest them!"

traits.locale_text: 「嘘だ！私は自ら望んで卑劣な行為を行ったり、異端者と同じように反逆行為を起こしたりはしない！異端者は嫌いだ！」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «¡Mentira! ¡No disfruto rebajándome a las cosas despreciables y repugnantes que hacen los herejes! ¡Los odio!».
languages.original_text: "Lies! I take no pleasure in stooping to the despicable and revolting things that heretics do! I detest them!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Mentira! ¡No disfruto rebajándome a las cosas despreciables y repugnantes que hacen los herejes! ¡Los odio!».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Lügen! Es bereitet mir keine Freude, mich zu den schändlichen, widerwärtigen Dingen herabzulassen, die Ketzer tun! Ich verabscheue sie!"
languages.original_text: "Lies! I take no pleasure in stooping to the despicable and revolting things that heretics do! I detest them!"

traits.locale_text: "Lügen! Es bereitet mir keine Freude, mich zu den schändlichen, widerwärtigen Dingen herabzulassen, die Ketzer tun! Ich verabscheue sie!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Mensonges ! Je ne prends aucun plaisir à m'approcher d'aussi près de ces hérétiques qui commette tant d'actes abominables ! Je les hais ! »
languages.original_text: "Lies! I take no pleasure in stooping to the despicable and revolting things that heretics do! I detest them!"

traits.locale_text: « Mensonges ! Je ne prends aucun plaisir à m'approcher d'aussi près de ces hérétiques qui commette tant d'actes abominables ! Je les hais ! »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Yalan! Kâfirlere has aşağılık ve mide bulandırıcı eylemlere başvurmaktan zevk almıyorum! Onlardan nefret ediyorum!"
languages.original_text: "Lies! I take no pleasure in stooping to the despicable and revolting things that heretics do! I detest them!"

traits.locale_text: "Yalan! Kâfirlere has aşağılık ve mide bulandırıcı eylemlere başvurmaktan zevk almıyorum! Onlardan nefret ediyorum!"
traits.speaker: Chorda
